programme.title: Softie
programme.desc: Political activist Boniface "Softie" Mwangi runs for office in a regional Kenyan election, but running a clean campaign against corrupt opponents is an uphill battle when based on idealism alone.

programme.title: The Jump
programme.desc: In 1970, a Lithuanian sailor and would-be defector jumped off his Soviet vessel aboard a US Coast Guard Cutter, asking for asylum. His leap led to one of the biggest political muddles of the Cold War.

programme.title: Tatort: Schimanski
programme.desc: Schimanski stirs up a case that Thanner had long since closed.

programme.title: Murder In
programme.desc: Part of a gorgeous collection of mysteries, each one set in a different, picturesque region of France. A sister and brother in Haute-Savoie investigate a series of deaths and uncover a few secrets of their own. French with English subtitles.

programme.title: Rocamadour (Sn 4 Ep 2)
programme.desc: Part of a gorgeous collection of mysteries, each one set in a different, picturesque region of France. A town in southwestern France that markets itself as a place for miracles gets a reckoning. French with English subtitles.

programme.title: Murder In
programme.desc: Albi's first black female police chief investigates the murder of a farmer.

programme.title: Murder In: Sarlat (Sn 2 Ep 6)
programme.desc: The son of a food manufacturer is murdered with a pitchfork, suggesting deaths inflicted in a 17th century rebellion.

programme.title: Murder In
programme.desc: Part of a gorgeous collection of mysteries, each one set in a different, picturesque region of France. A young captain on her first murder case attempts to take the reins from her semi-retired partner. French with English subtitles.

programme.title: Murder In: Aveyron (Sn 1 Ep 1)
programme.desc: Homicide Investigators Elisabeth and Paul find themselves in the middle of a family feud.

programme.desc: A young virtuoso pianist is found dead in a similar position to a famous Leonardo da Vinci drawing.

programme.desc: A statue of Saint Therese is used to conceal the body of a murdered young woman.
